name: CIS Critical Security Controls v8.1

Updated NIST CSF security function mappings

description: Prioritized set of actions to protect organizations and data from known cyber attack vectors

ig1.name: Implementation Group 1 (IG1)

ig1.organization_profile: Small to medium with limited IT expertise

ig2.name: Implementation Group 2 (IG2)

ig2.organization_profile: Medium organizations with IT staff, sensitive data

ig3.name: Implementation Group 3 (IG3)
ig3.description: For organizations with significant security resources
ig3.organization_profile: Large organizations, regulated industries, high-value targets
